job_tasks.phrase: Als Full Stack Java Ontwikkelaar werk je aan uitdagende projecten die een blijvende impact maken voor onze klanten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes working on challenging projects that make a lasting impact for clients, which is a core aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zorgt voor oplossingen die perfect aansluiten op de wensen van de klant
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the responsibility of creating solutions that meet client needs, a fundamental task in software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: draagt bij aan de verbetering van onze werkwijze en expertise.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to the improvement of work methods and expertise is a general software development task related to process improvement and team growth.

soft_skills.phrase: Je zorgt voor oplossingen die perfect aansluiten op de wensen van de klant
soft_skills.justification: Ensuring solutions align with client wishes demonstrates an understanding of business needs and how to translate them into technical deliverables.

soft_skills.phrase: draagt bij aan de verbetering van onze werkwijze en expertise.
soft_skills.justification: Contributing to the improvement of work methods and expertise implies collaboration and knowledge sharing within the team.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software development tasks (building projects, creating solutions for clients, improving work methods) using Java. There is no mention of AI/ML specific tasks, models, or tools, nor any indication of integrating AI/ML into the product. Therefore, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the role being a 'Java full stack ontwikkelaar' and outlines typical software engineering responsibilities without any mention of AI/ML. This makes the classification straightforward and highly confident.
